basics.name: ILLIA KRAUCHANKA
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Richard hails from Tulsa. He has earned degrees from the University of Oklahoma and Stanford. (Go Sooners and Cardinal!) Before starting Pied Piper, he worked for Hooli as a part time software developer. While his work focuses on applied information theory, mostly optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory. He could tell you about it, but THAT would NOT be a “length-limited” conversation!

work.name: Coherent Solutions
work.description: Coherent Solutions, founded in 1995 and headquartered in Minneapolis, USA, specializes in custom software development and consulting with a global presence.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

work.name: Adform
work.description: Adform is a Danish company specializing in digital advertising technology. Founded in 2002, it provides a comprehensive advertising platform that supports the creation, buying, and selling of digital advertising across various internet-connected devices.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

work.name: ISsoft Belarus
work.description: ISsoft specializes in software development and IT consulting, focusing on delivering high-quality IT solutions primarily for the North American and European markets

work.name: NK Support
work.description: NK Support provides managed server options, cloud support, DevOps services, and website support, ensuring systems are secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally.
work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Implemented a comprehensive network optimization project that improved system efficiency and reliability by 30%, using advanced monitoring tools and configuration management practices
Developed and deployed scripts to automate routine system maintenance tasks, reducing manual labor by 40% and significantly decreasing the margin for error
Led a virtual servers  migration initiative, transitioning legacy systems to a scalable cloud environment, which enhanced operational agility and reduced operational costs by 20%
Effectively managed taleted engineers to cover the L1 support with constant expanding of the team

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
